name: PageReferences
shortdesc: A collection of index page references.

parameter.name: source
parameter.shortdesc: The text or insertion point to which the page reference points.

parameter.name: pageReferenceType
parameter.shortdesc: The page number for an index page reference or the last page in an index page reference page range. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: pageReferenceLimit
parameter.shortdesc: The paragraph style or number of paragraphs or pages that defines the last page in a page range. Valid only when page reference type specifies the next use of a paragraph style or a number of paragraphs or pages. . Can accept: ParagraphStyle or Long Integer. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: pageNumberStyleOverride
parameter.shortdesc: The style override for the page number.  &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new PageReference &#40;Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the PageReference.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the PageReference with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the PageReference with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the PageReference with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the PageReferences within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The PageReference, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: PageReference, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The PageReference, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: PageReference, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first PageReference in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last PageReference in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle PageReference in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the PageReference with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the PageReference that follows the desired PageReference.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the PageReference whose index follows the specified PageReference in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The PageReference whose index comes before the desired PageReference.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any PageReference in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every PageReference in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the PageReference.
Returns the PageReference with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
